subject: Greetings to you
body:
Greetings to you
My name is Brian Perez I work with a very reputable financial institution in Uk I have a very profitable business I want to share with you for our mutual benefit 
kindly get back to me with your private email and WhatsApp telephone for more details
Kindly reply me on my confidential email account: 
brianperezes773@gmail.com
I look forward to your response.
Respectful
Mr Brian Perez

subject: Re: Greetings to you
body:
Hello Mr. Brian Perez,

It's a pleasure to meet you! I'm always interested in hearing about new business opportunities. Could you please provide me with more details about this venture? What kind of business is it and how can we mutually benefit from it?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thelma
